---
id: GetSingle订单
title: Get Single 订单
sidebar_label: Get Single 订单
sidebar_position: 1
description: /spot/v4/order/{orderId}
---

**类型:** GET

**描述:** `/spot/v4/order/{orderId}`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### 参数

| 名称      | 类型   | 必需 | 默认值值 | 描述 |
| --------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| `orderId` | 数字 | Yes       |         | 订单 ID    |

### 响应示例

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "字符串",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
    "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
    "client订单Id": "16559590087220001",
    "base货币": "字符串",
    "quote货币": "字符串",
    "side": "BUY", // order side: BUY, SELL
    "type": "LIMIT", // order type: LIMIT, MARKET
    "timeInForce": "GTC", // effective way: GTC, IOC, FOK, GTX
    "price": "40000",
    "origQty": "2", // original quantity
    "origQuoteQty": "48000", // original amount
    "executedQty": "1.2", // executed quantity
    "leavingQty": "字符串", // quantity to be executed (0 if cancelled/rejected)
    "tradeBase": "2", // transaction quantity
    "tradeQuote": "48000", // transaction amount
    "avgPrice": "42350", // average transaction price
    "fee": "字符串", // handling fee
    "fee货币": "字符串",
    "state": "NEW", // order state: NEW, PARTIALLY_FILLED, FILLED, CANCELED, REJECTED, EXPIRED
    "time": 1655958915583, // order time
    "updatedTime": 1655958915583
  }
}
```
